article: A student and his teacher are walking past a field. They  _  an old pair of shoes. The shoes are the old man's. He's  _  on the other side of the field. The student says, "Let's  _  the shoes away. It will be funny when he  _  find his shoes." The teacher says, "Don't play a  _  on others. It may be funny for you, but  _  will he do without shoes?" Then the teacher puts some  _  into the shoes and says," Let's go behind the tree." A few minutes later, the old man comes to  put on  his shoes. When he finds the money, he looks around. No one is there. He cries and  _  ,"Thank you very much for the money! My wife is ill and my children have nothing to  _  ."
